name: ZomBehead!
summary:
"ZomBehead!" is a variation of clicker games, it features 18 non-stop crazy levels, funny characters, bonuses and surprises, a cool story line and original mechanics not seen in other clickers.
You must have good concentration and fast reflexes.
The name of the game ZomBehead! is a combination of Behead and Zombie (Behead the Zombie!). Said aloud, it sounds like Zombie Head.
